titles.title: To prohibit the use of Federal funds and the provision of technical assistance for the Heritage Partnership Program and National Heritage Areas.
To prohibit the use of Federal funds and the provision of technical assistance for the Heritage Partnership Program and National Heritage Areas.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Public Lands and Environmental Regulation.

bill.summary: Prohibits the use of federal funds or the provision of technical assistance for the Heritage Partnership Program or any National Heritage Area.
